## Provider Information

**Provider Name:** [e.g., Kaiser Permanente, Blue Cross Blue Shield]

**Provider Type:**
- [ ] Hospital/Health System
- [ ] Insurance EOB
- [ ] Pharmacy
- [ ] Dental
- [ ] Vision
- [ ] Retail (FSA/HSA eligible items)
- [ ] Other: ___

**Website/Portal:** [URL if applicable]

## Document Format

**Document Type:**
- [ ] PDF
- [ ] Paper (scanned)
- [ ] Email attachment
- [ ] Portal download

**Key Fields to Extract:**
- [ ] Patient Name
- [ ] Service Date
- [ ] Provider/Facility Name
- [ ] Billed Amount
- [ ] Insurance Paid
- [ ] Patient Responsibility
- [ ] Other: ___

## Sample Document

If possible, attach a **redacted** sample showing the document format.
**IMPORTANT:** Remove all personal information (names, dates of birth, account numbers, etc.)

Any other information about the document format or extraction challenges.
